subject: Request for Return – Defective Steering Wheel Hub Paddle Shifter
description_text:
Hello Simsonn Support Team,

I am contacting you to request a return of my Steering Wheel Hub, as one of
the paddle shifters has a manufacturing defect.

Specifically, one of the paddles does not have a single linear travel.
Instead, it has two distinct stages of movement, as if there is mechanical
play or looseness. This causes two internal parts not to move together,
resulting in an inconsistent and incorrect feel compared to the other
paddle.

I have attached a video where the defect can be clearly seen and heard.

Given that this is a manufacturing issue present under normal use, I would
like to request a return and refund (or replacement, if applicable). Please
let me know the next steps to proceed with the return process.

Thank you for your assistance. I look forward to your response

Best regards,
Alex


 Simsonn Wheel hub
<https://drive.google.com/open?id=1gF3bo8tMXcWWIc5bdwrIvPPi0fh4twx4>

conversations.body_text: Hi Alejandro Hernando Muñoz,     You just need to tighten these two screws. Please give it a try—this should fix the issue. If it still feels abnormal after tightening, let me know.
